Aconitum Napellus.name: Aconitum Napellus
keynotes: Fear of death, predicts the time of death
Complaints from exposure to dry, cold wind

Belladonna.name: Belladonna
keynotes: Hot, red, flushed face with dilated pupils
Throbbing pains, especially in the head
Delirium with visions and desire to escape
